attacks.name: Aqua Reverse
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has Team Magma in its name and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses which Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.name: Deep Impact
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
